label: ball
caption: Two black dogs, their coats glistening in the sunlight, can be seen racing across a lush green field on a warm summer day. The larger dog is hotly pursuing his companion, who is now slowing down as he realizes he still has the ball clutched tightly in his jaws. The smaller dog, panting with exhaustion, finally comes to a stop and releases the ball, which rolls away into the tall grass.
